channel.title: Interface Giving Items [Pi]
channel.description:
Hey Okay I Know How To Make An Interface And Add Logo's In But I Need To Know How To Add It So When I Click Logo, It Gives The Players Items, Cant Find Any Tuts On This.
Because I Want It So When They Login For First Time It Will Say Range Meele Mage And Give Them The Basic Equipment, Just Like A Starter But Seperated Out

item.title: Interface Giving Items [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I would advise learning some Java programming before taking on an interface. Sometimes, they can get really confusing to make.

Read full topic
